text: If the sun were the size of a typical front door, Earth would be the size of a nickel.
Sound doesn't travel through space because there are no molecules to vibrate.
The word 'robot' comes from a Czech word meaning 'forced labor.'
A flea can accelerate faster than a space shuttle.
Helium is the only element that was discovered on the sun before it was found on Earth.
The shortest scientific paper ever published had zero words — just a blank page as a response.
Einstein's famous equation E=mc² shows that a baseball-sized amount of matter could power the world for a year.
The smell after rain is called 'petrichor,' coined in 1964 by Australian scientists.
Static electricity can be lethal in certain industrial settings when it ignites flammable materials.
A neutron star is so dense that a teaspoon would weigh 6 billion tons.
Lasers can be trapped in a stream of water because of total internal reflection.
The temperature of lightning is about 30,000 Kelvin — 5 times hotter than the sun's surface.
Time slows down for astronauts on the ISS relative to people on Earth — they age slightly slower.
A piece of paper can't be folded more than about 7 times by hand, but theory allows for more.
The strongest living creature relative to its size is the dung beetle, lifting 1,141 times its body weight.
Water can exist in three states at the same time at its 'triple point' (0.01°C, 611.66 Pa).
Rubber bands last longer when refrigerated.
The inventor of the microwave oven noticed the candy bar in his pocket melted while working on radar.
A day on Pluto lasts 153.3 hours.
Glass is technically a liquid that flows extremely slowly over centuries — but this is debated.
The fingerprints of koalas are almost indistinguishable from human fingerprints.
There are more atoms in a teaspoon of water than there are teaspoons of water in the Atlantic Ocean.
Absolute zero is impossible to reach — it would violate the third law of thermodynamics.
The longest recorded flight of a chicken is 13 seconds.
Cyanide smells like almonds, but not everyone can detect it due to a genetic variation.
The Earth is the densest planet in our solar system.
Ostriches can run faster than horses.
The original name for a search engine was 'BackRub' — before Google.
Polar bear fur is actually transparent, not white — it just appears white.
A bolt of lightning contains enough energy to toast 100,000 slices of bread.
The shortest complete sentence in English is 'Go.'
Atoms are 99.9999999% empty space.
The Great Wall of China is not visible from space without aid — this is a myth.
A hummingbird's heart beats up to 1,260 times per minute.
Sound travels 4.3 times faster through water than through air.
A cockroach can live for several weeks without its head.
The first computer virus was created in 1986 and was called 'Brain.'
The world's largest snowflake on record was 15 inches wide.
Cats can't taste sweetness because they lack the receptor gene.
Pluto hasn't completed an orbit since its discovery in 1930 — one Pluto year is 248 Earth years.
The average person walks enough in their lifetime to circle the Earth 5 times.
Venus rotates backwards compared to other planets.
A teaspoonful of soil contains more microorganisms than there are people on Earth.
The longest recorded sneezing fit lasted 976 days.
Honey bees must visit about 2 million flowers to make one pound of honey.
Jupiter's Great Red Spot is larger than Earth.
Butterflies taste with their feet.
The first email was sent in 1971 — the message was 'QWERTYUIOP.'
Sharks have been around longer than trees — 400 million vs 350 million years.
A snail can sleep for three years.
